vendors.name: ClickHouse
vendors.description: Open-source columnar OLAP database optimized for real-time analytics with security-specific advantages (native IP types, 50-100× CIDR query speedup).
vendors.cost_notes: OSS self-hosted free. ClickHouse Cloud: consumption-based. Enterprise support: $50K-150K/year. TCO varies with scale.

evidence_sources.description: Uber production: 100+ trillion events, powers real-time analytics for 1B+ rides, sub-second query performance

vendors.name: Trino
vendors.description: Open-source distributed SQL query engine for federated analytics across heterogeneous data sources (S3, databases, APIs). Formerly PrestoSQL.
vendors.cost_notes: OSS free. Infrastructure: $50-100K/year. Commercial support (Starburst): $100K+/year.

evidence_sources.description: Bloomberg production: Petabyte-scale queries, powers financial analytics, Meta (Facebook) origin validation

vendors.name: Microsoft Azure Sentinel
vendors.description: Cloud-native SIEM with AI-powered threat intelligence and automated response. Deep integration with Microsoft ecosystem (E5, Defender, Azure).
vendors.cost_notes: Ingestion: $12K/month. Retention (365 days): $18K/month. Search jobs: $1-5K/month. Total: $31-35K/month.

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Microsoft Azure Sentinel positioned as Leader (same as Microsoft Sentinel)

vendors.name: Amazon Athena
vendors.description: Serverless interactive SQL query engine for analyzing data in Amazon S3. Pay-per-query pricing ($5/TB scanned) ideal for cost-conscious teams. Native Iceberg support enables partitioning optimizations that reduce scan costs 70-90%.
vendors.cost_notes: $5 per TB scanned. Optimized with Iceberg partitioning to reduce scan costs 70-90%. No infrastructure costs (serverless).

evidence_sources.description: Forrester Wave for Cloud Data Warehouse 2024: Amazon Athena recognized as Strong Performer

vendors.name: Apache Iceberg
vendors.description: Open table format for huge analytic datasets. Winner of format wars with universal multi-engine support (Spark, Trino, Flink, Snowflake, Athena). ACID transactions, time travel, schema evolution, hidden partitioning enable production data lakehouse architectures.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache License). Infrastructure-only costs (storage + compute engines). Lowest operational overhead. No licensing fees.

evidence_sources.description: Apple production: Exabyte-scale lakehouse, powers Apple services analytics, format wars winner validation

vendors.name: Snowflake Data Cloud
vendors.description: Cloud-native data warehouse with lakehouse capabilities. Multi-cloud support (AWS, Azure, GCP), Iceberg support, strong data governance and sharing. Consumption-based pricing with managed service simplicity.
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption pricing (compute + storage). Costs can escalate with inefficient queries or continuous compute. Typical security workload: $50-150/TB/month all-in.

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud Database Management Systems 2024: Snowflake positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Databricks Lakehouse Platform
vendors.description: Unified analytics platform built on Apache Spark with Delta Lake and Unity Catalog governance. Strong ML/AI capabilities, multi-cloud support (AWS, Azure, GCP), acquired Tabular (Iceberg creators) for universal format support.
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption pricing (DBUs + storage). Strong ML capabilities justify premium for data science-heavy use cases. TCO analysis shows lakehouse advantage over traditional platforms.

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Science and Machine Learning Platforms 2024: Databricks positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Starburst Enterprise
vendors.description: Enterprise Trino distribution with advanced security, performance optimizations, and support.
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing

vendors.name: Dremio
vendors.description: Data lakehouse platform with semantic layer and query acceleration.
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing

vendors.name: Apache Druid
vendors.description: Real-time analytics database optimized for fast aggregations.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source free

evidence_sources.description: Airbnb production: Real-time analytics dashboard, Netflix production, sub-second aggregations at scale

vendors.name: Google BigQuery
vendors.description: Serverless enterprise data warehouse with built-in ML capabilities.
vendors.cost_notes: $6.25/TB scanned

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud Database Management Systems 2024: Google BigQuery positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Splunk Enterprise Security
vendors.description: Traditional SIEM with extensive detection content.
vendors.cost_notes: Per-GB ingestion pricing

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Splunk Enterprise Security positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Elastic Security (SIEM)
vendors.description: Security analytics built on Elastic Stack.
vendors.cost_notes: Per-GB ingestion

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Elastic Security positioned as Niche Player

vendors.name: CrowdStrike Falcon LogScale
vendors.description: Next-gen SIEM with petabyte-scale streaming analytics, formerly Humio. Sub-second search with 365+ days hot data retention.
vendors.cost_notes: Per-GB with unlimited plans available

evidence_sources.description: Forrester Wave for SIEM 2024: CrowdStrike Falcon LogScale recognized as Strong Performer

vendors.name: Apache Kafka
vendors.description: Open-source distributed event streaming platform. Industry standard for real-time data pipelines.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source, infrastructure only

evidence_sources.description: LinkedIn production deployment: 7 trillion messages/day, Kafka origin company, powers all LinkedIn infrastructure

vendors.name: Apache Flink
vendors.description: Stateful stream processing with exactly-once semantics. Flink 2.0 with cloud-native disaggregated state storage (ForSt).
vendors.cost_notes: Open source, infrastructure only

evidence_sources.description: Alibaba production: Processes trillions of events daily, powers Double 11 shopping festival at massive scale

vendors.name: Chronicle Security (Google SecOps)
vendors.description: Cloud-native SIEM on Google infrastructure with petabyte-scale analytics. 12-month hot retention, Gemini AI queries.
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing with VirusTotal/Mandiant threat intel

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Google Chronicle positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Devo Platform
vendors.description: Cloud-native security data platform (SIEM + SOAR + UEBA). 400 days hot retention, AI-powered ThreatLink automation.
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing with 400-day hot retention

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Devo positioned as Niche Player

vendors.name: IBM QRadar SIEM
vendors.description: Enterprise SIEM with advanced threat detection. Strong in regulated industries (finance, healthcare).
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing (EPS/FPM based)

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: IBM QRadar positioned as Challenger

vendors.name: Sumo Logic Cloud SIEM
vendors.description: Cloud-native SIEM with AI-powered threat detection and MITRE ATT&CK integration.
vendors.cost_notes: Credit-based consumption model

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Sumo Logic positioned as Niche Player

vendors.name: Amazon Kinesis Data Streams
vendors.description: Serverless streaming service for real-time data ingestion. On-demand and provisioned capacity modes.
vendors.cost_notes: $0.015/GB ingested

evidence_sources.description: Forrester Wave for Streaming Data Platforms 2023: Amazon Kinesis positioned as Strong Performer

vendors.name: Airbyte
vendors.description: Open-source ELT platform with 600+ connectors. Capacity-based pricing with free self-hosted option.
vendors.cost_notes: Free OSS self-hosted, capacity-based cloud pricing

evidence_sources.description: GitHub community: 15K+ stars, 600+ connectors, Y Combinator backed, production deployment validation

vendors.name: Confluent Platform
vendors.description: Enterprise Kafka distribution with managed cloud service. Serverless autoscaling with 60% TCO reduction vs self-managed.
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption-based eCKUs with autoscaling

evidence_sources.description: Forrester Wave for Streaming Data Platforms 2023: Confluent positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Apache NiFi
vendors.description: Real-time dataflow automation with drag-and-drop UI. Low-code data integration with data provenance tracking.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache License), infrastructure-only costs

evidence_sources.description: NSA origin (donated to Apache), production validated for data provenance tracking, real-time ETL validation

vendors.name: Fivetran
vendors.description: Automated data pipelines with 700+ connectors. Zero-maintenance ELT with real-time syncing.
vendors.cost_notes: MAR pricing per connector (March 2025), subscription-based

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools 2024: Fivetran positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Cribl Stream
vendors.description: Data routing and transformation for observability/security data. Reduces downstream SIEM costs 40-70%.
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing, 1TB/day free tier, ROI via cost reduction

vendors.name: Matillion Data Productivity Cloud
vendors.description: Cloud-native ELT for Snowflake/Redshift/BigQuery. Maia AI virtual data engineers (2025).
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption-based, unlimited users, 271% ROI potential

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools 2024: Matillion positioned as Visionary

vendors.name: Qlik Talend Cloud
vendors.description: Unified data integration/quality/governance with 1000+ connectors. AI transformation assistant.
vendors.cost_notes: Capacity-based subscription, 4 editions, OSS version free

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Data Integration Tools 2024: Qlik Talend positioned as Niche Player

vendors.name: Amazon S3
vendors.description: Industry-leading cloud object storage with 11-nines durability. Data lake foundation with Iceberg-native support.
vendors.cost_notes: $0.023/GB/month standard, Intelligent-Tiering auto-optimizes

vendors.name: Azure Blob Storage
vendors.description: Massively scalable object storage with 11-nines durability. SFTP support, hot/cool/cold/archive tiers.
vendors.cost_notes: $0.018/GB/month hot tier, tiered storage with reserved capacity discounts

vendors.name: Google Cloud Storage
vendors.description: Scalable object storage with multi-class storage. BigQuery and Vertex AI integration.
vendors.cost_notes: $0.020/GB/month standard, multi-tier storage classes

vendors.name: MinIO
vendors.description: High-performance S3-compatible object storage for AI/ML. Multi-gigabit throughput, Kubernetes-native.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (AGPL v3), infrastructure-only, full S3 API compatibility

evidence_sources.description: Production adoption: 1B+ containers deployed, 50% Fortune 500 usage, AI/ML workload validation

vendors.name: Ceph Object Storage (RGW)
vendors.description: Open-source distributed storage with S3 API compatibility. 111 GiB/s GET throughput (2025 benchmarks).
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (LGPL), exabyte-scale capability, Red Hat support available

evidence_sources.description: CERN production: Exabyte-scale storage for Large Hadron Collider, Red Hat benchmarks 111 GiB/s throughput

vendors.name: AWS Glue Data Catalog
vendors.description: Serverless metadata catalog. First 1M objects free, Schema Registry, Lake Formation integration.
vendors.cost_notes: First 1M objects free, $1 per 100K objects/month, generous free tier

vendors.name: Microsoft Purview Data Governance
vendors.description: Unified data governance with pay-as-you-go pricing (Jan 2025 model). Governed assets and DGPU-based.
vendors.cost_notes: Pay for governed assets only (no scan cost), new pricing model Jan 2025

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Metadata Management Solutions 2024: Microsoft Purview positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Alation Data Intelligence Platform
vendors.description: Agentic data intelligence with 120+ connectors. AI-powered documentation, catalog pioneer (founded 2012).
vendors.cost_notes: Asset-based pricing (2025), enterprise ~$198K/year

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Metadata Management Solutions 2024: Alation positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Collibra Data Intelligence
vendors.description: Unified data catalog, governance, quality, AI governance. Gartner Leader 2025.
vendors.cost_notes: Yearly subscription, Gartner Leader 2025, premium pricing

vendors.name: Apache Atlas
vendors.description: Open metadata management for Hadoop and beyond. Data lineage, business glossary, Ranger integration.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache License), infrastructure-only, Ranger RBAC integration

evidence_sources.description: Hortonworks (Cloudera) production: Hadoop metadata management at scale, Ranger RBAC integration validated

vendors.name: Datadog
vendors.description: Cloud-scale monitoring, security, and analytics platform. 600+ integrations, AI-powered insights, unified observability for infrastructure, applications, and security.
vendors.cost_notes: Pro: $15/host/month, Enterprise: $23/host/month, usage-based add-ons

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Application Performance Monitoring 2024: Datadog positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Splunk Observability Cloud
vendors.description: Full-stack observability with APM, infrastructure monitoring, RUM. AI-driven insights, OpenTelemetry-native.
vendors.cost_notes: Host-based + usage pricing, OpenTelemetry-native reduces lock-in

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Application Performance Monitoring 2024: Splunk Observability positioned as Challenger

vendors.name: New Relic One
vendors.description: Unified observability platform with AI-powered insights (Grok AI). 100GB/month free tier, consumption-based pricing.
vendors.cost_notes: 100GB/month free, $0.30/GB ingested, generous free tier

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Application Performance Monitoring 2024: New Relic positioned as Visionary

vendors.name: Dynatrace
vendors.description: AI-powered full-stack observability. Davis AI for automatic root cause analysis, 15-day free trial, enterprise-grade.
vendors.cost_notes: Host-based + usage, Davis AI included, premium pricing

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for Application Performance Monitoring 2024: Dynatrace positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Honeycomb
vendors.description: High-cardinality observability for modern distributed systems. BubbleUp for anomaly detection, OpenTelemetry-first.
vendors.cost_notes: Free tier 20M events/month, consumption-based, high-cardinality optimized

vendors.name: Microsoft Sentinel
vendors.description: Cloud-native SIEM with AI, same as Azure Sentinel. Microsoft 365/Azure integration, SOAR capabilities.
vendors.cost_notes: $2.46/GB ingestion + retention costs

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Microsoft Sentinel positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Wazuh
vendors.description: Open-source XDR and SIEM platform. Built on Elastic Stack, MITRE ATT&CK integration, free for unlimited agents.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (GPL v2), unlimited agents, infrastructure-only

evidence_sources.description: GitHub community: 10K+ stars, 2K+ contributors, 1M+ downloads, active OSS SIEM community validation

vendors.name: Graylog
vendors.description: Open-source log management and SIEM. 5GB/day free tier, low TCO, rapid deployment.
vendors.cost_notes: 5GB/day free, Enterprise: per-node licensing, cloud available

evidence_sources.description: Community adoption: 50K+ production deployments, 5GB/day free tier, rapid deployment validation

vendors.name: Grafana Loki
vendors.description: Open-source log aggregation optimized for Prometheus. Cost-effective alternative to Elasticsearch, Grafana-native.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (AGPL), 10× cheaper storage vs Elasticsearch

evidence_sources.description: Grafana Labs: 1M+ Loki deployments, 10× cost savings validated vs Elasticsearch, CloudFlare production

vendors.name: Exabeam Fusion SIEM
vendors.description: SIEM + UEBA with New-Scale architecture. Unlimited storage, behavioral analytics, rapid deployment.
vendors.cost_notes: User-based pricing, unlimited data storage

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Exabeam positioned as Niche Player

vendors.name: Securonix Unified Defense SIEM
vendors.description: AI-driven SIEM with UEBA and SOAR. Unified platform for threat detection and response.
vendors.cost_notes: Per-GB ingestion, includes UEBA and SOAR

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Securonix positioned as Leader

vendors.name: Rapid7 InsightIDR
vendors.description: Cloud SIEM with integrated UEBA and EDR. User-based pricing, rapid deployment, built-in automation.
vendors.cost_notes: User-based pricing, includes EDR and UEBA

evidence_sources.description: Gartner Magic Quadrant for SIEM 2024: Rapid7 InsightIDR positioned as Niche Player

vendors.name: Sysdig Secure
vendors.description: Cloud-native security with runtime threat detection. Kubernetes-native, eBPF-based, CNAPP capabilities.
vendors.cost_notes: Per-agent pricing, includes runtime protection

vendors.name: Apache Pulsar
vendors.description: Cloud-native distributed messaging/streaming. Multi-tenancy, geo-replication, tiered storage. Yahoo/StreamNative origin.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), tiered storage reduces costs vs Kafka

evidence_sources.description: Yahoo (origin company): 100B+ messages/day, StreamNative production validation at scale

vendors.name: Redpanda
vendors.description: Kafka-compatible streaming platform. 10× faster, C++ rewrite, no JVM/Zookeeper. Wasm transforms.
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption-based, 10× lower latency, free tier available

evidence_sources.description: Independent benchmarks: 10× faster than Kafka, 6× lower p99 latency, zero-copy architecture validation

vendors.name: Azure Event Hubs
vendors.description: Managed event streaming service. Kafka-compatible, autoscaling, Azure ecosystem integration.
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption-based, $0.028/million events, Kafka-compatible

evidence_sources.description: Forrester Wave for Streaming Data Platforms 2023: Azure Event Hubs positioned as Strong Performer

vendors.name: Google Cloud Pub/Sub
vendors.description: Serverless messaging service. Global scale, at-least-once delivery, Dataflow integration.
vendors.cost_notes: $40/TiB throughput, 10GB/month free, serverless autoscaling

evidence_sources.description: Forrester Wave for Streaming Data Platforms 2023: Google Cloud Pub/Sub positioned as Strong Performer

vendors.name: RabbitMQ
vendors.description: Lightweight message broker. AMQP protocol, flexible routing, easy deployment. CloudAMQP managed service.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (MPL 2.0), CloudAMQP managed: $19-399/month

evidence_sources.description: Community adoption: 50K+ GitHub stars, 1M+ production deployments, CloudAMQP 100K+ managed instances

vendors.name: Apache Storm
vendors.description: Real-time computation system. Fault-tolerant, guaranteed processing, mature ecosystem.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), infrastructure-only, mature but lower adoption vs Flink

evidence_sources.description: Apache project: Production validated for real-time computation, Twitter (origin), guaranteed processing semantics

vendors.name: PrestoDB
vendors.description: Distributed SQL query engine. Meta/Facebook origin, ANSI SQL, federated queries, 100+ connectors.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), predecessor to Trino, infrastructure-only

evidence_sources.description: Meta (Facebook) origin: Petabyte-scale SQL queries, 10-100× faster than Hive, production validated

vendors.name: Apache Drill
vendors.description: Schema-free SQL query engine for Hadoop, NoSQL, cloud storage. Self-service data exploration.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), schema-free advantage, infrastructure-only

evidence_sources.description: Apache project: Schema-free SQL query engine, MapR/Drill production deployments, self-service data exploration

vendors.name: Apache Pinot
vendors.description: Real-time OLAP datastore. Sub-second latency, high concurrency, LinkedIn origin, Uber/Stripe use.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), real-time OLAP specialist, infrastructure-only

evidence_sources.description: LinkedIn (origin) + Uber + Stripe production: Real-time OLAP at scale, sub-second queries on trillion+ events

vendors.name: Rockset
vendors.description: Real-time analytics database. Converged indexing, sub-second SQL, Kubernetes-native, serverless.
vendors.cost_notes: Consumption-based, converged indexing, serverless scaling

vendors.name: Delta Lake
vendors.description: Open table format with ACID transactions. Databricks origin, time travel, schema evolution, UniForm for Iceberg compatibility.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), infrastructure-only, UniForm enables Iceberg interop

evidence_sources.description: Comcast production: 50+ PB lakehouse, UniForm enables Iceberg compatibility, Databricks origin

vendors.name: Apache Hudi
vendors.description: Transactional data lake platform. Uber origin, incremental processing, record-level updates, streaming inserts.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), incremental processing reduces compute costs

evidence_sources.description: Uber (origin): Incremental processing at petabyte scale, record-level updates, streaming inserts validated

vendors.name: Denodo Platform
vendors.description: Logical data warehouse with real-time data virtualization. Query federation, data catalog, enterprise-grade.
vendors.cost_notes: Subscription pricing, enterprise data virtualization leader

evidence_sources.description: Gartner reports: Denodo recognized as Leader in Data Virtualization Solutions

vendors.name: Apache Calcite
vendors.description: Dynamic data management framework. SQL parser, query optimizer, adapter framework. Powers Drill, Flink, Hive.
vendors.cost_notes: Open source (Apache 2.0), framework-level, infrastructure-only

evidence_sources.description: Apache framework: Powers Drill, Flink, Hive SQL optimization, industry-standard query optimizer validation
